Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/California
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Kedzie, and Montrose, due to police activity near Montrose/California.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Montrose, California, Irving Park, Kedzie, and Montrose, due to police activity near Montrose/California.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound  Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound  Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at LaSalle. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at LaSalle.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
